update si_client
client_no = #{clientNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
client_type_id = #{clientTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
client_name = #{clientName,jdbcType=CHAR},
contact = #{contact,jdbcType=CHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=CHAR},

create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

insert into si_client (client_id , client_no, client_type_id, client_name, contact, phone, email, fax, url, address, remark, create_time, dr) values
(#{po.clientId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.clientNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.clientTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{po.clientName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.contact,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.email,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.fax,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.url,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.address,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.remark,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{po.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{po.dr,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.select:
select
from si_client where client_no = #{clientNo, jdbcType=CHAR} limit 1

select
from si_client c where dr = 1 and c.client_no like '%' #{cno,jdbcType=CHAR} '%' and c.client_name like '%' #{cname,jdbcType=CHAR} '%'
mapper.sql: c.client_id, c.client_no, c.client_type_id, c.client_name, c.contact, c.sex, c.phone, c.email, c.fax, c.url, c.credit_level_id, c.area, c.address, c.remark, c.create_time, c.update_time, c.dr,cl.credit_level_name,ct.client_type_name
mapper.select:
select
from si_client c left join dd_credit_level cl on c.credit_level_id = cl.credit_level_id left join dd_client_type ct on c.client_type_id = ct.client_type_id where c.dr = 1 and c.client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
